hero.title: Master React Development
hero.description: Complete React learning platform with interactive lessons, live coding exercises, and comprehensive coverage of all React concepts from fundamentals to advanced patterns.

features.title: Comprehensive Lessons
features.description: Learn React from basics to advanced concepts with detailed explanations and examples.

features.title: Interactive Coding
features.description: Practice React concepts with live coding exercises and instant feedback.

features.title: Hands-on Examples
features.description: Explore real-world examples and patterns used in modern React applications.

features.title: Progressive Learning
features.description: Follow a structured learning path from beginner to advanced React developer.

fundamentals.title: React Fundamentals
fundamentals.description: Master the core concepts of React development with comprehensive lessons and examples.

nextSection.title: Ready for Advanced Topics?
nextSection.description: Once you've completed the fundamentals, explore advanced React concepts including Hooks, Context, and Performance optimization.
